name: Newton's Law (HomineLudens)
description:
Nothing is more inevitable than gravity.

Try to defeat Newton's Laws and stop the apple from hitting the ground

(Newtons head removed for safety reasons..)

Developed for the 50th Ludum Dare in Compo Solo.

Play and grab the code here:

https://microstudio.dev/HomineLudens/newtonlaw/

Clone it, make any changes and have fun

Quite crazy I manage to finish it as I was very short on time weekend.
